alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 1:34AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Pine, southwestern Douglas and Burnett Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 134 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Askov, to 9 miles east of Hinckley, to near Rush City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bruno around 140 AM CDT. Mille Lacs Band Lena Lake Area around 150 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Trade Lake, Duxbury and Danbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
